option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Start with a short sentence in imperative form, no more than 50 characters long. This sentence should start with the type of the changes (fix, feat, ...) with the domain into braces like "fix(domain): ..." or "fix(project:doamin): ..." for repo with many projects. Then leave an empty line and continue with a more detailed explanation. Write only one sentence for the first part, and two or three sentences at most for the detailed explanation.
